Double mutant of lgals3a and lgals3b

Construct consisting of: Cas9-2a-mCherry expressed in neutrophils (LyzC promoter). CRISPR1 targeting chemokine (C-X-C motif) receptor 4a (CXCR4a) & CRISPR2 targeting chemokine (C-X-C motif) receptor 4b (CXCR4b) - expressed globally, driven by U6 promoters; rnu6-7 for CXCR4a & rnu6-32 for CXCR4b. Construct expressed in mpx:GFP line that label neutrophils with GFP.

Construct consisting of: Cas9-2a-mCherry expressed in neutrophils (LyzC promoter). CRISPR targeting chemokine (C-X-C motif) receptor 1 (CXCR1) - expressed globally, driven by U6 promoter (rnu6-32). Heart muscle labeled with EGFP (CMLC2 - Cardiac Myosin Light Chain 2 promoter) for screening. Construct expressed in mpx:GFP line that label neutrophils with GFP.

Construct consisting of: Cas9-2a-mCherry expressed in neutrophils (LyzC promoter). CRISPR targeting chemokine (C-X-C motif) receptor 2 (CXCR2) - expressed globally, driven by U6 promoter (rnu6-32). Heart muscle labeled with EGFP (CMLC2 - Cardiac Myosin Light Chain 2 promoter) for screening. Construct expressed in mpx:GFP line that label neutrophils with GFP.
